definition: pearl milk tea/tapioca milk tea/bubble milk tea
see 聖女果|圣女果[sheng4 nu:3 guo3]
mother-of-pearl (used in ornamentation and in TCM)

pinyin: zhen1 zhu1 fei3 cui4 bai2 yu4 tang1

definition: Pearl S. Buck (1892-1973), American writer known for her novels on Asian cultures, Pulitzer Prize and Nobel Prize laureate

sentences.english: Is that a real string of pearls？
The pearls are all about the same size. It's quite a short necklace.
sentences.chinese: 是由小顆的珍珠串起來的很短的項鍊。

sentences.english: Mrs Hollister : My sister gave me those pearls.
sentences.chinese: 我姐姐給我的珍珠項鍊，怎麼也找不到。

sentences.english: In this paper, the preparation technology for Spirulina colour- pearled drink was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對螺旋藻珍珠粒飲料的製作技術進行了較深入地研究。

sentences.english: She was wearing a string of cheap pearls about her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她脖子上戴着一串廉價的珍珠。

sentences.english: Most pearls have a soft silvery-white or cream shine.
sentences.chinese: 珍珠大都有柔和的銀白色或奶色光澤。

sentences.english: Double jetted pockets at front and detailed pearl snap buttons.
sentences.chinese: 前胸開雙脣袋及配上珍珠鈕作裝飾。

sentences.english: Clove encounter on the way home, orb said pearl.
sentences.chinese: 丁香在回家的路上碰到寶珠，寶珠說珍珠事了。

sentences.english: There is no pollution along Hainan's sea, so its pearl is preeminent.
sentences.chinese: 海南沿海純淨無污染，海南珍珠品質超羣。

sentences.english: Think studs and a pearl necklace, if you must wear jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 如果你必須戴首飾，就考慮耳釘和珍珠項鍊。

sentences.english: There is no other pearl to be found in the shadowy folds of life.
sentences.chinese: 在生活的黑暗褶子裏，是找不到其他的珍珠的。

sentences.english: The pearly gallstone was discharged after Treatment with Magnetic Field (TMF).
sentences.chinese: 由旋磁療法治療膽石症患者獲得珍珠形膽結石。

sentences.english: Have you ever heard of a pearl necklace?
sentences.chinese: 你有聽過珍珠項鍊的比喻嗎？

sentences.english: Hepu gulf is of unique geographical position for pearl's growing.
sentences.chinese: 合浦沿海得天獨厚的海灣是繁衍珍珠的最佳場所。

definition: shell/conch/cowry/mother of pearl/hard outer skin/also pr. [bei4 qiao4]

small diamonds/melee (small diamonds used in embellishing mountings for larger gems)/splints (sharp-pointed diamond splinters)/clatersal (small diamond splints from which diamond powder is produced by crushing)
pearls and jades/jewels/clever remark/beautiful writing/gems of wisdom/genius/outstanding person
red coral/precious coral (Corallium rubrum and several related species of marine coral)
